mapper.select: select id, email, title, author, publisher, image, m_title, m_star, m_content, registdate from mybooklist where email = #{email} and (title like '%'||#{readkeyword}||'%' or author like '%'||#{readkeyword}||'%' or publisher like '%'||#{readkeyword}||'%')

select id, image, m_title, m_star, m_content, registdate from (select id, image, m_title, m_star, m_content, registdate, rownum rnum from (select * from mybooklist where email = #{email} order by registdate desc)) where rnum between #{start} and #{last}
select count(*) from mybooklist where email=#{email}
mapper.insert:
select mybooklist_seq.nextval from dual
insert into mybooklist(id, email, title, author, publisher, image, m_title, m_star, m_content, registdate) values(#{id},#{email},#{title},#{author},#{publisher},#{image},#{m_title}, #{m_star}, #{m_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update mybooklist set m_title=#{m_title}, m_star=#{m_star}, m_content=#{m_content}, registdate=sysdate where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select title, count(*) as count from mybooklist group by title order by count(*) desc

select member.userName userName, booklist.title, booklist.m_star, booklist.m_content, booklist.logregistdate from mybooklist booklist, tbl_member member where booklist.email = member.userID order by booklist.logregistdate desc
